title: Huge Hamilton Island Three-Bedroom Ocean-View Villa with Golf Buggy Hire
description:
Barefoot relaxation, palm-fringed beauty and world-class water activities amid the Great Barrier Reef await you at Ocean View Villas Hamilton Island, just a five-minute buggy ride from Catseye Beach and Hamilton Island Marina. Nestled at the heart of the island, your three-bedroom villa invites you to experience one of Australia's most spectacular and sought-after destinations on the ultimate sunkissed escape. Discover your own slice of island paradise when you stroll along the silky-white sand beaches littered with colourful seashells, hear the song of the tropical birds, and dive into the unmatched turquoise waters.

Whether you’re whisking the whole family away for some fun in the sun or you’re taking a break with friends, this perfectly positioned retreat invites you to relax, unwind and explore Queensland’s world-famous Whitsundays region at your own pace. Stock up on groceries at the local store to create dishes in the comfort of your villa, or treat yourself at one of the island's waterside restaurants: this is your escape, your way.
offer_address: 9 Acacia Drive, Hamilton Island, Queensland 4803, Australia

title: Iconic Hamilton Island Escape with Coral Sea View Upgrade, A$100 Credit & Daily Breakfast
description:
Barefoot relaxation, palm-fringed beauty and world-class water activities on the Great Barrier Reef await you at this Hamilton Island gem, overlooking Catseye Beach. A tropical paradise where romantic seclusion and family fun exist side by side, this popular hotel is the perfect island break, in one of Australia's most spectacular and sought-after destinations.

The Reef View Hotel is a destination that gets the tropical tick of approval. For those looking to relax and unwind, there's a spa, sauna and four glittering pools to choose from. Indulge in sumptuous fare at the Pool Terrace restaurant or laze on your private balcony and admire the spectacular sunset.

When it's time to tear yourself away from the comfort of the hotel, you'll be perfectly positioned to explore the area, with stunning beaches, renowned restaurants and a myriad of outdoor activities all within easy reach by foot, golf buggy or complimentary island shuttle.
offer_address: 12 Resort Drive, Hamilton Island, Queensland 4803, Australia

title: Iconic Hamilton Island Family Escape with Daily Breakfast & Sunset Cruise
description:
Overlooking Catseye Beach's hypnotic turquoise waters, Reef View Hotel Hamilton Island offers an iconic Whitsundays experience. A tropical paradise where romantic escapes and family fun exist side-by-side, this luxurious hotel is the perfect island break, a short stroll from Hamilton Island Marina in the heart of one of Australia’s most spectacular and sought-after destinations, the Great Barrier Reef.

Indulge in a quintessential Whitsundays escape with a guaranteed upgrade to a Coral Sea View Room and enjoy daily breakfast, return transfers from the airport or marina, complimentary use of non-motorised watersport equipment and the scheduled island shuttle service. Ramp up the romance with a complimentary 90-minute sunset cruise for two adults with included drinks and canapés.

**Perfect for families**: Up to two children (aged 12 years and under) stay and eat free with a paying adult in participating restaurants.

**Planning a romantic escape?** Check out our romantic Hamilton Island escape to [Palm Bungalows](https://luxuryescapes.com/au/offer/palm-bungalows-hamilton-island-qld-australia/0062y000002zGWzAAM), perfect for couples.
offer_address: 12 Resort Drive, Hamilton Island, Queensland 4803, Australia

title: Ultra-Luxe Waterfront Hamilton Island Villa Escape for up to Eight People
description:
Don't miss out on the ultimate 2021 escape with a luxury stay at the exclusive Hamilton Island Yacht Club Villas - an idyllic retreat for families and friends, with each lavish villa catering for up to eight guests.

Offering some of the most luxurious accommodation in the Great Barrier Reef, Hamilton Island Yacht Club Villas boast a prime waterside position by the marina in a limited-access complex. Set amid a sun-soaked backdrop of lush jungle canopies, each four-bedroom, four-bathroom self-catering abode offers a relaxing sanctuary while still having the best of the island's buzzing shops and restaurants within easy reach.

Cook up a storm in your state-of-the-art kitchen or head out to one of the island's fabulous casual eateries, where kids can eat free. Lounge on your private deck soaking up stunning partial ocean views or take the five-minute golf buggy ride to the beautiful Catseye Beach. Choose to spend leisurely days exploring the glistening waters by kayak, indulging in a pamper session at the day spa or capturing postcard-perfect views from the top of Passage Peak.
offer_address: 23 Front St, Hamilton Island QLD 4803

title: Iconic Hamilton Island Escape with Coral Sea View Upgrade, A$100 Credit & Daily Breakfast
description:
Overlooking Hamilton Island’s turquoise waters, the Reef View Hotel offers an iconic Whitsundays escape. A tropical paradise where romantic seclusion and family fun exist side by side, this popular hotel is the perfect island break in proximity to one of Australia’s most spectacular and sought-after destinations, the Great Barrier Reef. When it's time to tear yourself away from the comfort of the hotel, you'll find yourself just a moment away from the sugar-fine sands of Catseye Beach and within close reach of Hamilton Island's vibrant shopping, dining and entertainment attractions. Aquamarine underwater adventures in the limpid Coral Sea and iconic Whitehaven Beach are both just a short boat ride from this idyllic island paradise.

Back at the hotel, the Reef View Hotel is a destination that gets the tropical tick of approval. For those looking to relax and unwind, there's Spa wumurdaylin (additional costs apply), a sauna and several pools to choose from: the Reef View Hotel Pool, Bougainvillea Pool and the 35-metre, lagoon-style Main Pool with a swim-up bar. Indulge in sumptuous fare at the Pool Terrace restaurant or laze on your private balcony and admire the spectacular sunset.
offer_address: 12 Resort Drive, Hamilton Island, Queensland 4803, Australia

title: Hamilton Island Tropical Paradise: Modern Bungalows with Daily Breakfast & A$100 Resort Credit
description:
Experience one of Australia’s most spectacular and sought-after destinations with a stay at the self-contained Palm Bungalows on Hamilton Island - your gateway to the Great Barrier Reef. These idyllic, freestanding bungalows are dotted throughout thriving, landscaped gardens, perfect for couples or small families looking for a tropical home away from home.

Each breezy bungalow places the best of Hamilton Island at your fingertips. Minutes from your doorstep, you can lounge on the pristine shores of Catseye Beach, laze the days away at one of three sparkling swimming pools or take a scenic hike to the highest point on the island, Passage Peak, for rewarding views.

In the evening, make use of the complimentary island shuttle and dine at one of the island's impressive restaurants and bars. From fine dining at Bommie to relaxed, share-style plates at Catseye Pool Club, each venue promises a culinary journey as captivating as the island itself.

title: Selling Fast: Hamilton Island Apartments with Whitehaven Beach Half-Day Tour
description:
**New dates added**: 2020 travel dates available

Prepare for barefoot luxury and unparalleled relaxation steps from the champagne shores of the iconic Catseye Beach at Whitsunday Apartments Hamilton Island. Nestled within the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef, this self-contained apartment stay invites you to experience one of Australia’s most spectacular and sought-after destinations with a romantic couples’ retreat or a sun-soaked family escape.

Stay in a self-contained Sea View Apartment with a welcome bottle of wine, two complimentary coffees per apartment, per day and return transfers from Hamilton Island Airport or marina.

Complete your stay with a Whitehaven Beach cruise for two adults included in your stay. This unparalleled experience includes a morning half-day tour of this divine jewel of the Great Barrier Reef with a cruise through picture-perfect isles, morning tea, a guided Solway Circuit walk and up to two hours at the southern end of Whitehaven Beach.

**Perfect for families or groups:** Enjoy plenty of flexibility with all packages valid for five people total. Simply choose the correct guest configuration.

Packages available for:

- Two adults and three children (aged 12 years and under)
- Three adults and two children (aged 12 years and under)
- Four adults and one child (aged 12 years and under)
- Five adults (aged 13 years and over)
offer_address: 14 Resort Dr, Whitsundays QLD 4803

description:
Wake to views of paradise at Ocean View Villas on Hamilton Island, a collection of self-contained group villas in the heart of the Whitsundays. Each three-bedroom property overlooks the vast ocean and surrounding islands from a private entertaining balcony, where you can make precious memories with the people you love.

Beautifully secluded, Ocean View Villas will feel like your personal pocket of bliss on one of the Whitsundays' most popular islands. Choose between a dip in the pool or hop in a golf buggy and discover four resort pools, one with a swim-up bar. With gourmet dining, an internationally renowned golf course, tropical spa and endless activities, Hamilton Island is a welcome break from reality.

title: Adults-Only Hamilton Island Beachfront Serenity with Daily Breakfast, A$200 Dining Credit & Return Transfers
description:
Welcome to the ultimate tropical paradise, where the crowning jewel of the Whitsundays dazzles with postcard-perfect charm. Sat in the middle of Queensland's most breathtaking archipelago, Hamilton Island is a playground of crystal-clear waters, powder-white beaches and endless natural beauty.

Prepare to be indulged at this adults-only hideaway that redefines sophisticated tropical living. Picture yourself lounging by the infinity pool with direct access to Catseye Beach, cocktail in hand, as you soak up ocean views so serene they could be plucked straight out of a travel magazine.

If you manage to peel yourself from your personal island oasis, you're ideally positioned to explore the Great Barrier Reef's underwater wonderland, with world-class snorkelling and diving just a boat ride away. Water sports lovers can enjoy paddleboarding or jet skiing across turquoise waters, while thrill seekers can enjoy sunset sailing or scenic helicopter tours.

title: Hamilton Island Self-Contained Bungalow Escape with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Resort Credit
description:
Experience one of Australia’s most spectacular and sought-after destinations with a stay at the self-contained Palm Bungalows on stunning Hamilton Island - the largest inhabited island of the Whitsundays archipelago and the ultimate launchpad for the iconic Great Barrier Reef.

The idyllic, freestanding Palm Bungalows are dotted throughout landscaped gardens and perfect for couples or small families looking for a tropical home away from home. Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2021 award, each bungalow has modern interiors, a king bed, large ensuite bathroom and a private balcony, where you can enjoy the warm ocean breeze. Better yet, the bungalows have a small kitchenette, allowing you to self-cater. Minutes from your doorstep, you can lounge on the shores of pristine beaches, take the short hike to the highest point on the island, Passage Peak, for breathtaking views, experience the myriad of colourful underwater life while scuba-diving or snorkelling, or charter a scenic helicopter flight.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Up to two children (12 years and under) stay and eat free from the kids' menu in participating restaurants
- Start each day with a delicious breakfast served at either Sails Restaurant or Pool Terrace Restaurant
- Indulge with A$50 resort credit to use at selected restaurants or on selected experiences and tours
- Enjoy convenient roundtrip shuttle transfers from Hamilton Island Airport or Marina
- Make memories to cherish with two cocktails and a sharing platter to redeem at One Tree Hil
- Make a splash with complimentary non-motorised watersports including catamarans, windsurfers, kayaks, stand-up paddleboards and snorkelling equipment
- Explore the island with ease thanks to the resort’s complimentary shuttle bus
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Longer Stay Bonus**: Extend your time in this tropical haven with a stay for six nights or more to enjoy a A$100 resort credit per package.

**Travelling with family?** Up to two children (12 years and under) stay and eat free in participating restaurants (see Fine Print for details).

**Whitehaven Beach Upgrade**: To ensure you make lasting memories, choose the incredible Whitehaven Beach Upgrade for two adults, which includes a half-day cruise with morning or afternoon tea, protective stinger suits, guided Solway Circuit walk and up to two hours at the southern end of Whitehaven Beach. Children can be added for a surcharge. See the Fine Print for details.

**Great Barrier Reef Upgrade**: Experience the world's largest coral reef system, the Great Barrier Reef, with a full-day cruise for two adults. Journey through the lush Whitsunday Islands to reach Reefworld at spectacular Hardy Reef, where you can visit the underwater observatory, take a ride in a semi-submarine or snorkel to see this colourful underwater world. Children can be added for a surcharge. See the Fine Print for details.
offer_address: Resort Drive, Hamilton Island, Queensland 4802, Australia

offer_address: 12 Resort Drive, Hamilton Island, Queensland 4803, Australia

title: Boutique Hamilton Island Beachfront Escape with Exclusive Outdoor Pool & Signature Island Dining
description:
Discover a sun-soaked haven nestled among the swaying palms of Catseye Beach with a stay at this luxurious Hamilton Island oasis, overlooking the cerulean waters of the Coral Sea. Here, the Sunday spirit lingers in the air, and rooms boast soothing, warm interiors with spacious terraces or balconies that serve up gorgeous tropical vistas.

Spend your days lounging by the sparkling outdoor pool, indulge in family-friendly fun with an array of non-motorised water sports, or head to the island's Spa wumurdaylin for some pampering. Culinary highlights await at Catseye Pool Club, where celebrated chefs Josh and Julie Niland showcase Australia's freshest seasonal produce and seafood in an elevated yet relaxed setting. Whether you're here to unwind or explore, this is island living at its finest - slow, sunny and unforgettable.
offer_address: 10 Palm Terrace Way, Whitsundays, Queensland 4802, Australia
